trans-unit.source: Add Rows
trans-unit.target: Add Rows

trans-unit.source: Appends a set of rows from an input dataset to the end of another dataset
trans-unit.target: Appends a set of rows from an input dataset to the end of another dataset

trans-unit.source: Category: <legacyLink xlink:href="92B32033-F75F-4854-AC8F-9110B3FE7E09" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Data Transformation / Manipulation</legacyLink>
trans-unit.target: Category: <legacyLink xlink:href="92B32033-F75F-4854-AC8F-9110B3FE7E09" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Data Transformation / Manipulation</legacyLink>

trans-unit.source: Module Overview
trans-unit.target: Module Overview

trans-unit.source: You can use the <ui>Add Rows</ui> module to concatenate two datasets by adding the rows of the second dataset to the end of the first dataset.
trans-unit.target: You can use the <ui>Add Rows</ui> module to concatenate two datasets by adding the rows of the second dataset to the end of the first dataset.

trans-unit.source: Concatenation of rows is useful in scenarios such as these:
trans-unit.target: Concatenation of rows is useful in scenarios such as these:

trans-unit.source: You have generated a series of evaluation statistics, and you want to combine them into one table for easier reporting.
trans-unit.target: You have generated a series of evaluation statistics, and you want to combine them into one table for easier reporting.

trans-unit.source: You have been working with different datasets, and you want to combine the datasets to create a final dataset.
trans-unit.target: You have been working with different datasets, and you want to combine the datasets to create a final dataset.

trans-unit.source: The number of rows in the output dataset should equal the sum of the rows of both input datasets.
trans-unit.target: The number of rows in the output dataset should equal the sum of the rows of both input datasets.

trans-unit.source: How to Use Add Rows
trans-unit.target: How to Use Add Rows

trans-unit.source: Connect the datasets to the two input ports.
trans-unit.target: Connect the datasets to the two input ports.

trans-unit.source: The dataset that you want to append should be connected to the second (right) port.
trans-unit.target: The dataset that you want to append should be connected to the second (right) port.

trans-unit.source: Run the experiment.
trans-unit.target: Run the experiment.

trans-unit.source: When adding two datasets together, these rules apply:
trans-unit.target: When adding two datasets together, these rules apply:

trans-unit.source: To concatenate rows together, the rows must have the same schema.
trans-unit.target: To concatenate rows together, the rows must have the same schema.

trans-unit.source: This means, the same number of columns, and the same type of data in the columns.
trans-unit.target: This means, the same number of columns, and the same type of data in the columns.

trans-unit.source: If you add the same dataset to both inputs of the <ui>Add Rows</ui> module, the dataset will be duplicated.
trans-unit.target: If you add the same dataset to both inputs of the <ui>Add Rows</ui> module, the dataset will be duplicated.

trans-unit.source: You cannot filter the source dataset when adding rows.
trans-unit.target: You cannot filter the source dataset when adding rows.

trans-unit.source: All the rows from both datasets provided as inputs are concatenated when you use <ui>Add Rows</ui>.
trans-unit.target: All the rows from both datasets provided as inputs are concatenated when you use <ui>Add Rows</ui>.

trans-unit.source: If you want to add only a few rows, use <link xlink:href="a8726e34-1b3e-4515-b59a-3e4a475654b8" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">M_Splitter</link> to define a condition by which to filter the rows and generate a dataset with only the rows you want.
trans-unit.target: If you want to add only a few rows, use <link xlink:href="a8726e34-1b3e-4515-b59a-3e4a475654b8" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">M_Splitter</link> to define a condition by which to filter the rows and generate a dataset with only the rows you want.

trans-unit.source: Examples
trans-unit.target: Examples

trans-unit.source: You can see examples of how this module is used by exploring these sample experiments in the <externalLink><linkText>Model Gallery</linkText><linkUri>http://gallery.azureml.net/</linkUri></externalLink>:
trans-unit.target: You can see examples of how this module is used by exploring these sample experiments in the <externalLink><linkText>Model Gallery</linkText><linkUri>http://gallery.azureml.net/</linkUri></externalLink>:

trans-unit.source: The <externalLink><linkText>Demand estimation</linkText><linkUri>http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=525271</linkUri></externalLink> sample combines the result of evaluating multiple models into a single dataset and passes it to an Execute R Script for custom processing
trans-unit.target: The <externalLink><linkText>Demand estimation</linkText><linkUri>http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=525271</linkUri></externalLink> sample combines the result of evaluating multiple models into a single dataset and passes it to an Execute R Script for custom processing

trans-unit.source: In the <externalLink><linkText>Breast cancer detection</linkText><linkUri>http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=525726</linkUri></externalLink> sample, datasets that contain useful features are cleaned and then combined by using <ui>Add Rows</ui>, <link xlink:href="5714a225-befd-438a-9bb5-f6fdc50a4efb" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Add Columns</link>, and <link xlink:href="124865f7-e901-4656-adac-f4cb08248099" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Join</link>.
trans-unit.target: In the <externalLink><linkText>Breast cancer detection</linkText><linkUri>http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=525726</linkUri></externalLink> sample, datasets that contain useful features are cleaned and then combined by using <ui>Add Rows</ui>, <link xlink:href="5714a225-befd-438a-9bb5-f6fdc50a4efb" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Add Columns</link>, and <link xlink:href="124865f7-e901-4656-adac-f4cb08248099" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Join</link>.

trans-unit.source: The <externalLink><linkText>Prediction of student performance</linkText><linkUri>http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=525727</linkUri></externalLink> sample uses <ui>Add Rows</ui> to combine the results of custom metrics that are computed by using <link xlink:href="6bd12c13-d9c3-4522-94d3-4aa44513af57" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Apply Math Operation</link>.
trans-unit.target: The <externalLink><linkText>Prediction of student performance</linkText><linkUri>http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=525727</linkUri></externalLink> sample uses <ui>Add Rows</ui> to combine the results of custom metrics that are computed by using <link xlink:href="6bd12c13-d9c3-4522-94d3-4aa44513af57" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Apply Math Operation</link>.

trans-unit.source: The <externalLink><linkText>Time Series Forecasting</linkText><linkUri>http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=525273</linkUri></externalLink> sample uses R scripts to generate custom metrics and then combines them in a single table by using <ui>Add Rows</ui>.
trans-unit.target: The <externalLink><linkText>Time Series Forecasting</linkText><linkUri>http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=525273</linkUri></externalLink> sample uses R scripts to generate custom metrics and then combines them in a single table by using <ui>Add Rows</ui>.

trans-unit.target: Exceptions

trans-unit.source: Exception
trans-unit.target: Exception

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: Description

trans-unit.source: An exception occurs if one or more of input datasets is null or empty.
trans-unit.target: An exception occurs if one or more of input datasets is null or empty.

trans-unit.source: An exception occurs if input datasets have column names that should match but do not.
trans-unit.target: An exception occurs if input datasets have column names that should match but do not.

trans-unit.source: An exception occurs if input datasets passed to the module should have compatible column types but do not.
trans-unit.target: An exception occurs if input datasets passed to the module should have compatible column types but do not.

trans-unit.source: An exception occurs if the parameter is not in range.
trans-unit.target: An exception occurs if the parameter is not in range.
